tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: #NavyHill, located in Washington, D.C. and home to #FSI’s Office of the Historian, has historic origins as a former observatory in the 1800s & a Navy hospital in the 1900s. Here, Chief Historian Adam shares this unique history to U/S Bulatao & #FSI Dep Dir Noyes. @HistoryAtState
